SEARCH
Package Commands

Class SetupCardInteractionCommand

java.lang.Object
Commands.SetupCardInteractionCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameCommand
public class SetupCardInteractionCommand extends Object implements GameCommand
Command to handle the initial interaction setup for a card when selected. This command is responsible for preparing and applying weapon effects to cards, handling the selection of cards for potential attacks, and managing mana costs.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new command for setting up card interactions.

  • Constructor Details

    • SetupCardInteractionCommand

      public SetupCardInteractionCommand(CardView cardView, GameManager gameManager, GameScene gameScene)
      Constructs a new command for setting up card interactions.
      Parameters:
      cardView - The card view that is being interacted with.
      gameManager - The game manager to access game state and control flow.
      gameScene - The game scene to update visual components.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(TaskStatus taskStatus)
      Executes the setup interaction for a card. This includes equipping weapons, selecting cards for attack, or initiating attacks based on the current game state and the properties of the selected card.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface GameCommand
      Parameters:
      taskStatus - The task status object to be updated based on the interactions.
